pullRequest.body:
This PR introduces the class of quasi-isomorphisms in the homotopy category of homological complexes.

---

below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they

nodes.body:
Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7839622422/job/21392937260)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7839622422/job/21392937353)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7839622422/job/21392937182)

I would prefer
```suggestion
def quasiIso : MorphismProperty (HomotopyCategory C c) :=
```
Or do you think the length will quickly become annoying?
Thanks for the suggestion. I do not think it will be annoying at all. I have made the change both for `HomologicalComplex.quasiIso` and `HomotopyCategory.quasiIso`.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Algebra/Homology): the class of quasi-isomorphisms in the homotopy category

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Algebra/Homology): two descriptions of the derived category as a localized category
feat/refactor: redefinition of homology + derived categories
